Module.Content:
<html>

					<style>
						html, body, iframe {
							width: 100%;
							height: 100%;
							margin: 0;
			        padding: 0;
						}
					</style>
				</head>

				<iframe src="https://t3c.meteor.com" frameborder=0></iframe>
				</body>
			</html>
